patches.title: Version - 0.7
patches.breif: MERRY CHRISTMAS! This update brings a christmas feel to the dashboard, notifications show on the top bar, notifications can be viewed via the "Check all notifications" button, and lastly notifications delete after 7 days.

patch.desc: Added the ability to view notifications via the top bar
Added the check all notifications button
Changed the way the editor links to the domain
Major rework of the updater code
Fixed a bug causing a new window to open when saving draft
Fixed a bug that caused dynamic elements to not work correctly
Fixed a bug causing new users to not have options
